title: Lamar Odom's Dad Joe Is In Good Spirits As His Son Recovers
text:
Lamar Odom's Dad Joe Is In Good Spirits As His Son Recovers 
Published By: X17 - Today 
Lamar's dad Joe Odom appeared to be in good spirits during a quick errand run at Walmart in Las Vegas near the hospital where his son is sai...
